Uses of Theme in com.interface21.web.servlet.support
 

Methods in com.interface21.web.servlet.support that return Theme
 Theme RequestContext.getTheme()
          Returns the current theme.
static Theme RequestContextUtils.getTheme(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
          Retrieves the current theme from the given request, using the ThemeResolver bound to the request by the DispatcherServlet, and the current WebApplicationContext.
